articles.description: More than 188 new cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Northumberland while the county’s hospital trust recorded no further deaths today.
articles.content: NHS England confirmed on Saturday, January 2, that a further 383 people, who tested positive for Covid-19 had died, bringing the total number of confirmed reported deaths in hospitals in England to 5… [+1194 chars]

articles.author: Noe Torres
articles.title: Mexican doctor hospitalized after receiving COVID-19 vaccine - Reuters UK
articles.description: Mexican authorities said they are studying the case of a 32-year-old female doctor who was hospitalized after receiving the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content: FILE PHOTO: A medical worker receives an injection with a dose of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine at the Regional Military Specialty Hospital in San Nicolas de los Garza, on the outskirts of Mon… [+1076 chars]
